description:
DO YOU WANT LEARN WORDPRESS 4 FROM SCRATCH?

Build Your Own Professional Website Easily?

With the Most Popular CMS of World?! Used by millions of users and famous websites!!

JOIN THIS COURSE AND MAKE YOUR BEST ONLINE SITE WITH LAST WORDPRESS!

Introducing excellent, online WORDPRESS 4 training that allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college. The course includes FULL introductory lessons to WORDPRESS CMS. You learn the install setup (on web or on local), commands and techniques for Adding new posts and Pages, create Categories, Profile settings, use Widget, Plugin install, Changing template layouts, and more with WORDPRESS with ease! You will become familiar with the Wordpress interface, Widget customization, Adding pages to website, Adding posts to the homepage, Managing menu, Processing comments, Plugins and Media, Making website live!

The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace.

ARE YOU READY TO BUILD OWN WEBSITE ONLINE NOW!!

The course package:
- 16 video tutorials (about 3.00 hours total)
- Great tutorials: step by step, how create your website online
- Videos available, 24 hours on 24
- Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
- Build your first website!

The course outline:
- What Is Wordpress ?
- Installation - on free hosting or wordpress website
- Using Custom Domain Name: URL
- The Dashboard
- Admin Profile
- Media Setup
- Add Posts to website
- Add Category
- Comments Options
- Menu Setting
- Menu
- Widget
- Tools
- Header Options
- Changing Page Layout
- Adding Link To NavBar
- Adding Posts to the Homepage
- Themes
- Managing Users and Permissions
- Comments reviews
title: How to Make a Wordpress Website 2016
